title: What’s your favorite song and why is this a particular one? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nowadays I'm listening to more songs of Coke Studio than I ever have …my favorite song is currently Muntazir by Danyal Zafar and Momina Mustehsan..it was sung in Coke Studio Season 10 Episode 1.This song is a beautiful one,it was produced and composed by the band,’Strings'.Danyal Zafar has done a great job in this song,being his first ever song performed live.Momina Mustehsan has always been a great singer,right from her first ever song,she has been getting a lot of praises. Muntazir is a romantic song,the lyrics are in Urdu, ‘Main yahan hoon muntazir ,tum wahan ho bekhabar'.The first line means ‘I am here waiting for you,you are there standing speechless and in awe'.This is a must listen to song and I recommend it to Rock lovers.

My all time favourite song is The greatest by Sia. This song is like a boost to my mind, whenever I hear this one, automatically I’m ready for anything to face. My favourite line is, “I'm free to be the greatest, I'm alive”.
